author: psmith
msg: Added a new RuleMediator class that mediates between
the components that generate/modify the sub-rules
and those needing to treat them all as a single Rule.

author: psmith
msg: removed a Menu separator that was not needed.

author: psmith
msg: seems more appropriate to have Radio buttons here, since
the user can only select one.

author: psmith
msg: EventContainer now accepts a generic Rule impl for filtering.

author: psmith
msg: Added new Rule sub-package, interface, an Abstract
class to provide some basic plumbing.
